meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lavish.
meanings.sent1: Her parties were known for their lavishnesses, with decorations covering every corner.
meanings.sent2: The lavishnesses of the royal palace impressed all the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The lavishnesses of the cake decorations made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The lavishnesses of nature's colors in the sunset were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The lavishnesses of the feast left everyone feeling full and happy.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extravagant expenditure or display.
meanings.sent1: The company's lavishnesses in spending on office parties raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her lavishnesses by buying designer clothes and expensive jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The lavishnesses of his gift-giving bordered on ridiculous.
meanings.sent4: The lavishnesses of the fireworks show lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The lavishnesses of the wedding celebration were talked about for years to come.
